summary.summary: CNN.com will feature iReporter photos in a weekly Travel Snapshots gallery. Please submit your best shots for next week. Visit CNN.com/Travel next Wednesday for a new gallery of snapshots.
definitions. Definitions are used to help people understand the meaning of words. Definitions can also be used to define different types of people. For more information, visit Dictionary.com.

CNN.com will feature iReporter photos in a weekly Travel Snapshots gallery. Please submit your best shots of the U.S. for next week. Visit CNN.com/Travel next Wednesday for a new gallery of snapshots.

Adaptive learning platforms like DreamBox adjust difficulty based on student. DreamBox can help students with reading comprehension, vocabulary, and other skills. For more information on DreamBox, visit their website.

AI chatbots can answer student queries instantly. They can be used to help students with reading comprehension, vocabulary, and vocabulary. The chatbot can also answer questions based on questions posed by students.
AI can be used to grade multiple-choice exams and analyze class performance. Teachers can also use AI to analyze students' performance on tests and quizzes.
